text: Digaula ga mmademmade i nnagadilinga magi huaidu, gei deai tangada e dangidangi i digaula ai be e danu digaula. Digaula ga mmoemmoe i hongo di gelegele gadoo be nnaga mungamunga mee hagauwwou. Digaula gaa mmade i tauwa be e mmade i di hiigai, gei nia huaidina digaula gaa hai nia mee e gai go nia manu mamaangi mono manu lodo geinga.
